state_summary: Eventual, a data processing engine company, was founded by Sammy Sidhu and Jay Chia to solve the data infrastructure problem faced by Lyft's autonomous vehicle program. The company built an internal tool for Lyft and later launched open source version of Daft, which is designed to work quickly across different modalities from text to audio and video.
evidence: The company launched the first open source version of Daft in 2022
Eventual raised $7.5 million seed round led by CRV and a $20 million Series A round led by Felicis with participation from Microsoft's M12 and Citi
keywords: data processing engine, multimodal data infrastructure, AI applications
